topic.title: World Intellectual Property Organization Glossary
topic.shortdesc: Key terms related to intellectual property and genetic resources, traditional knowledge and traditional cultural expressions.

body.p: The present online Glossary is an abridged version of document “”. The proposed definitions it contains are not exhaustive or necessarily authoritative; other terms may also be relevant to intellectual property and genetic resources, traditional knowledge, and traditional cultural expressions and the terms selected may also be defined in other ways. The selection and proposed definitions are not necessarily agreed upon by participants in the Intergovernmental Committee on Intellectual Property and Genetic Resources, Traditional Knowledge and Folklore.

The present online Glossary is an information document informally made available on the WIPO website for information purposes only and does not constitute legal advice or should be considered as an authoritative source.
